definition: see 沙撈越|沙捞越[Sha1 lao1 yue4]
sand/gravel/granule/variant of 沙[sha1]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more

sentences.english: The flying hornbill represents our home state, Sarawak, taking us from Borneo to the host country, China, which is represented by the panda.
sentences.chinese: 犀鳥代表我們故鄉砂拉越，以及熊貓代表主人家中國。
